mapper.sql: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.type_id, b.key_word, b.summary, b.content, b.right_type, b.click AS click, b.reply AS reply, b.create_time, b.modify_time, b.`status`, b.thumb, t.NAME AS type_name, t.code AS type_code FROM t_blog b LEFT JOIN t_blog_type t ON b.type_id = t.id
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title FROM t_blog b WHERE b.id < #{id} AND b.`status` = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT b.id, b.title FROM t_blog b WHERE b.id > #{id} AND b.`status` = 1 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT b.id, b.title FROM t_blog b WHERE b.type_id = #{typeId} AND b.id != #{id} AND b.`status` = #{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_blog SET click = click + #{num} WHERE id = #{id}
